author: Justin Lahart
title: The Mystery of the Small-Cap Rally
text:
There are some good reasons for investors to favor smaller market capitalization stocks these days, but they may not be the main reasons for why the small-cap shares are outperforming.
It has been a good year for small-caps. The Russell 2000 is up 5.9% so far and the S&P Small Cap 600 is up 7%. In contrast, the large-cap benchmark S&P 500 is up all of 1.5%.
Coming...
